billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Limits sinking funds for reserves for retirement of stocks and debentures
summary: Provides that a sinking fund for a limited-profit housing company (Mitchell-Lama) for the retirement of stocks and debentures shall be authorized only when the earnings of such housing company exceed six percent; provides that deposits in such sinking fund shall not be a factor in the determination of rents.
